snippet.title: Apollo 13: The Lost Tapes VR - Launch Trailer | PS VR2 Games
snippet.description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009627

The true story of the Apollo 13 mission that they don't know you to know... Apollo 13 was a top secret time travel experiment to a Mars military colony 200 years into the future. They successfully opened a portal to the future, but they also opened a doorway to dimensions of unfathomable horror... 

#ps5 #psvr2 #psvr2games 

Rated Mature
